entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
